And Jack Smith should have expedited and declared "emergency" every single slow-walked hearing and distraction that Cannon tried to throw in the way of convicting Trump, so there would be no question of his culpability under the law.     https://constitution.findlaw.com/amendment14/annotation15.html#:\~:text=Section%20Three%20of%20the%20Fourteenth,rebellion%22%20against%20the%20United%20States.
